content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I confirmed that beautifulsoup4 was already installed on my computer. I attempted to execute a shell command to retrieve information from the AllTrails website, but received an error message with no output. I received a message from the AI with a Python code to scrape the website and retrieve distance and elevation gain information. I executed the code but received an error message due to a NameError with 'distance'.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import os\\nos.system(\\"pip install requests beautifulsoup4\\")\\nimport requests\\nfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup\\n\\nurl = \\"https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada\\"\\n\\nresponse = requests.get(url)\\n\\nsoup = BeautifulSoup(response.content, \\"html.parser\\")\\n\\ninfo = soup.find_all(\\"div\\", {\\"class\\": \\"text-body\\"})\\n\\ndistance = \\"\\"\\nelevation_gain = \\"\\"\\n\\nfor i in info:\\n    if \\"Distance\\" in i.get_text():\\n        distance = i.get_text()\\n    elif \\"Elevation Gain\\" in i.get_text():\\n        elevation_gain = i.get_text()\\n\\nprint(distance)\\nprint(elevation_gain)\\n", "name": "scrape_website.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: Requirement already satisfied: requests in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (2.31.0)\nRequirement already satisfied: beautifulsoup4 in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (4.12.2)\nRequirement already satisfied: idna<4,>=2.5 in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (from requests) (3.4)\nRequirement already satisfied: charset-normalizer<4,>=2 in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (from requests) (3.1.0)\nRequirement already satisfied: certifi>=2017.4.17 in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (from requests) (2023.5.7)\nRequirement already satisfied: urllib3<3,>=1.21.1 in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (from requests) (1.26.16)\nRequirement already satisfied: soupsieve>1.2 in /usr/local/lib/python3.10/site-packages (from beautifulsoup4) (2.4.1)\n\n\n', type='action_result')]
"""
